result.eng: We'd rather go on holiday in the winter.
result.ga: B'fhearr linn dul ar saoire sa gheimhreadh

result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr linn dul ar saoire sa ġeiṁreaḋWe'd rather go on holiday in the winter.

result.eng: I would rather have coffee than tea.

result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr liom caife ná taeI would rather have coffee than tea.

result.eng: I'd rather stay inside the building.

result.eng: Wouldn't you rather go somewhere else?
